tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE goods_tracking (
  shipment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id UUID,
  inbound_time TIMESTAMP,
  outbound_time TIMESTAMP,
  RFID_tag VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE incoming_goods (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    item_code TEXT NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    rfid_tag TEXT UNIQUE
);

CREATE TABLE outgoing_goods (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    item_code TEXT NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    rfid_tag TEXT UNIQUE
);

CREATE TABLE cross_docking (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    incoming_goods_id UUID REFERENCES incoming_goods (id),
    outgoing_goods_id UUID REFERENCES outgoing_goods (id),
    dock_number INT NOT NULL,
    time_stamp TIMESTAMPTZ
);

CREATE TABLE goods (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(255),
  rfid_tag VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE incoming_goods (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  goods_id INT,
  arrival_time TIMESTAMP,
  rfid_tag VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE outgoing_goods (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  goods_id INT,
  departure_time TIMESTAMP,
  rfid_tag VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE cross_docking_center (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  capacity INT
)

CREATE TABLE cross_docking_logs (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  goods_id INT,
  action_type VARCHAR(50),
  action_time TIMESTAMP
)
